sense.def:
An expedient
je dejanje, ki doseže določen namen, vendar morda ni etično sprejemljivo.

seg.quote: Incomes controls were used only as a short-term expedient.

sense.def:
Kar je
expedient to do something
, je koristno ali prikladno za nekaj.

seg.quote: The President did not find it expedient to attend the meeting.
